left.text: Hmmm... you MAY HAVE SEEN THIS ONE COMING.

right.text: Honestly, this is probably the 4th or 5th time I planned to write something like this, but I always gave up. Ehn, it couldn't have gotten much more obvious.

left.text: I guess you can be shocked, but if you looked all all those drawings I did, it'd be pretty damn obvious.

right.text: Hooray for Mike W. M. Woolman, I don't know how I should refer to you :\, Zaphod, and Feenachan who doesn't read this, and I've only talked to once, but meh anyways.

left.text: Thanks to the whopping 3 who I told for not telling the whole world about it.
